document_data.name: Shalheira Talandren
document_data.mainbody: '''Shalheira Talandren''' of Summerstar was a [[high elf]] and a [[bard]] of the 14{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Bibliography: They authored [[Silver Blades and Summer Nights: An Informal but True History of Cormanthor]] in the {{yearlink|1355}}.
